channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 对于一些求职者来说，宠物可能会在面试过程中发挥意想不到的作用，或者成为新员工迅速离职的原因。
item.description:
For some job candidates, pets can play an unexpected role in the interview process—or become the reason for a new hire’s quick exit. https://t.co/swYq7jS9Hx https://t.co/swYq7jS9Hx

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: Robinhood 的联合创始人 Baiju Bhatt 将辞去首席创意官一职，转而从事其他创业活动。
item.description:
Robinhood's co-founder Baiju Bhatt will step down from his chief creative officer role to pursue other entrepreneurial interests https://t.co/lmHrwd84vC https://t.co/lmHrwd84vC

item.title: 亚马逊正重点关注新兴电子商务竞争对手特姆优和Shein，认为这两个新兴平台对其在线购物主导地位构成重大威胁
item.description:
Amazon is focusing on emerging e-commerce rivals Temu and Shein, viewing the newer platforms as significant threats to its online shopping dominance https://t.co/lVN43zhlLl https://t.co/lVN43zhlLl

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 权力的游戏》的主创们正在着手制作他们的第一个 Netflix 项目。这一次，主角不再是龙和异鬼，而是脱水的尸体、复杂的物理学和外星人的入侵。
item.description:
The "Game of Thrones" creators are embarking on their first Netflix project. This time, instead of dragons and White Walkers, there are dehydrated bodies, complicated physics and an alien invasion. https://t.co/fhID3rt9Kh https://t.co/fhID3rt9Kh

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 多年来，苹果公司一直面临着对其流行设备严密控制的投诉--这正是司法部在其具有里程碑意义的诉讼中提出质疑的地方
item.description:
Apple has faced complaints for years about the tight control it maintains around its popular devices—exactly what the Justice Department is challenging in its landmark lawsuit https://t.co/eQwUHtwyxW https://t.co/eQwUHtwyxW

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 拉法的 100 多万居民--其中大部分来自加沙地带的其他地方--正在准备迎接以色列与哈马斯之间战争的最后一场决定性战役
item.description:
More than a million people in Rafah—most of them from other parts of the Gaza Strip—are bracing for the last decisive battle in the war between Israel and Hamas https://t.co/nMnnToyX0g https://t.co/nMnnToyX0g

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 中国对这个曾经充满活力的城市的控制日益加强，香港社会的任何角落都无法幸免。"当潜规则、不成文的规定越来越多时，人们感到迷茫，只能眼睁睁地看着，默默地接受"。
item.description:
No corner of Hong Kong’s society has been left untouched by China’s tightening grip on the once-vibrant city. “When there are more and more unspoken, unwritten rules, people feel lost and can only watch and silently accept.” https://t.co/Vv66v31dkX https://t.co/Vv66v31dkX

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 基辅在空中和海上部署了无人机，取得了致命的效果。现在，它计划在地面上重复这一战略。但这一举措并非没有挑战。
item.description:
Kyiv has deployed drones to deadly effect in the air and sea. Now, it plans to repeat the strategy on the ground. But the push isn’t without challenges. https://t.co/Rz098N1PzI https://t.co/Rz098N1PzI

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 宅在家里的闺蜜们在 TikTok 上上传了大量关于自我保健、烹饪、清洁的视频，以及对传统婚姻的理想化憧憬--少了结婚戒指
item.description:
Stay-at-home girlfriends have flooded TikTok with videos of self-care, cooking, cleaning and an idealized vision of a traditional marriage—minus the wedding ring https://t.co/4FR5Z1m6WC https://t.co/4FR5Z1m6WC

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 美国联合航空公司去年在行李运送方面表现较差。美国航空公司的情况有所改善，但总体而言是最差的。
item.description:
United Airlines did worse on baggage delivery last year. American Airlines improved but was the worst overall. https://t.co/aptHNuiXcX https://t.co/aptHNuiXcX

item.title: 拳击手奥斯卡-德拉霍亚（Oscar De La Hoya）在拉斯维加斯再下一城--这一次，他将在拉斯维加斯建造一座豪华住宅，其中包括一个价值 40 万美元的私人洞穴和一个向其职业生涯致敬的房间。
item.description:
Boxer Oscar De La Hoya is going another round with Las Vegas—this time with a tricked out home with features like a $400,000 man cave and a tribute room that pays homage to his career https://t.co/QU1KI5Jg5P https://t.co/QU1KI5Jg5P

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 一位 50 岁的首席执行官的死亡引发了关于如何应对车辆落水的问题。以下是关键的最初 60 秒内应知道的事项。
item.description:
The death of a 50-year-old chief executive sparked questions about how to respond if your vehicle ends up in water. Here’s what to know in those critical first 60 seconds. https://t.co/1S9GhENHsS

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 世界著名钢琴演奏家拜伦-雅尼斯（Byron Janis）的文章选集，他于上周去世，享年 95 岁。

item.title: 以色列一名高级国防官员正在为一项计划寻求地区支持，该计划旨在争取与哈马斯没有任何联系的巴勒斯坦领导人参与援助分配，并最终建立一个由巴勒斯坦领导的管理机构。
item.description:
A top Israeli defense official is seeking regional support for a plan to enlist Palestinian leaders, with no links to Hamas, for aid distribution and eventually a Palestinian-led governing authority https://t.co/I6Rnj54yuJ https://t.co/I6Rnj54yuJ

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）的支持者们正在推动提升他的社交媒体平台 Truth Social 的价值，从而为他带来近 35 亿美元的意外之财。
item.description:
Donald Trump’s supporters are pushing to hand him a nearly $3.5 billion windfall by driving up the value of his also-ran social-media platform Truth Social, which is on the cusp of getting approval to list on the stock market https://t.co/9ncRNnBxje https://t.co/9ncRNnBxje

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 在全美房地产经纪人协会同意改变房地产佣金的运作方式后，美国紧张的春季售房季变得更加混乱了
item.description:
America’s stressful spring home-selling season just became even more chaotic after the National Association of Realtors agreed to change how real-estate commissions work https://t.co/6V0eDWJTSt https://t.co/6V0eDWJTSt

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 🎧 听：在今天的 "新闻播客 "中，@JessBravin 解释了为什么拜登政府努力打击其所认为的有关 Covid-19 疫苗的网络错误信息，而这一努力成为最高法院的焦点。
item.description:
🎧 Listen: In today's episode of The Journal podcast, @JessBravin explains why the Biden administration's effort to go after what it saw as online misinformation about Covid-19 vaccines is in the spotlight of the Supreme Court https://t.co/vXCB1tbT9E https://t.co/vXCB1tbT9E

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 多年来，穆斯塔法-苏莱曼（Mustafa Suleyman）在 DeepMind、谷歌和一家全新的人工智能公司牵头推动了一些最受瞩目的人工智能项目。
item.description:
Mustafa Suleyman, who's spearheaded some of the highest-profile artificial intelligence pushes over the years at DeepMind, Google and a brand-new AI company, is leaving his startup to take a top spot at Microsoft https://t.co/j4qa7rXR8W https://t.co/j4qa7rXR8W

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：2024 年的总统竞选将由人口不到美国五分之一的七个州决定。@KarlRove 写道：这些战场将获得几乎所有的关注。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: The 2024 presidential race will be decided by seven states with less than a fifth of the U.S. population. These battlegrounds will get almost all the attention, writes @KarlRove. https://t.co/OJHW3vNar8 https://t.co/OJHW3vNar8

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：Arthur M. Diamond 写道：一项旨在减轻 Covid 负担的政府计划反而增加了纳税人和欺诈受害者的负担。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: A government program that intended to reduce the Covid burden instead increased burdens on taxpayers and victims of fraud, writes Arthur M. Diamond https://t.co/gmqlFUkLpW https://t.co/gmqlFUkLpW

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：职责和紧迫性是总统享有广泛刑事起诉豁免权的界限。特别顾问杰克-史密斯（Jack Smith）试图消除一条惯例，@俄亥俄州检察长写道。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: Duty and urgency mark the boundaries of broad presidential immunity from criminal prosecution. Special counsel Jack Smith has sought to erase a line of custom, writes @OhioAG. https://t.co/W4wcIRgVmw https://t.co/W4wcIRgVmw

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: Mistral AI、Hugging Face 和其他公司都在打赌，他们可以通过开源技术与 OpenAI 和大型科技公司抗衡，但这可能会导致风险大于收益。
item.description:
Mistral AI, Hugging Face and others are betting they can stand up to OpenAI and big tech firms by making their technology open source—but it could lead to more risk than reward https://t.co/9m7IwB02S4 https://t.co/9m7IwB02S4

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 正在开发的血液稀释剂可以预防导致心脏病发作和中风的血凝块，而且没有一些副作用

Blood thinners are being developed that could prevent the clots that cause heart attacks and strokes—without some of the side effects https://t.co/955UAh01mj https://t.co/955UAh01mj

item.title: 为了拯救以色列，查克-舒默决定，他必须谴责以色列领导人本雅明-内塔尼亚胡总理。"我脑子里想了很多，也挣扎了很久："这对以色列和美以关系来说是正确的吗？"
item.description:
To save Israel, Chuck Schumer decided, he had to denounce its leader, Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu. “A lot of thought and wrestling in my head: Is this the right thing to do for Israel, and for the U.S.-Israeli relationship?” https://t.co/jTtB9yKhNL https://t.co/jTtB9yKhNL

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024

item.title: 无论是含酒精还是不含酒精的饮料，加入鲜艳、果味浓郁的verjus，都能让人惊喜地感受到它的深度和口感。
item.description:
Whether alcoholic or non, a drink gets surprising depth and bite from a splash of bright and fruity verjus https://t.co/hT2Yi9Pu4t https://t.co/hT2Yi9Pu4t

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：拜登的赌注是，承诺将公共开支提高到 7 万亿美元以上会让选民对总统及其政党感觉更好。然而，@DanHenninger 写道：过度膨胀的山姆大叔可能会适得其反。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The Biden bet is that promising to push public spending past $7 trillion will make voters feel better about the president and his party. Overstuffing Uncle Sam, however, may be doing the opposite, writes @DanHenninger. https://t.co/gqkXrpV609

— The Wall Street Journal (@WSJ) March 22, 2024
